text.autoconfig.imbleeding.title: Haemorrhage Config
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.enable: Player will get darkness after taking damage at low HP
Player will get blindness at 1 hp
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.fireDa: Fire damage lowers duration of bleeding
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.enable: Melee attacks upgrade bleeding (or health loss, when attacked by spider)
While having Bleeding I, player will get Bleeding II with increased duration after getting damage from melee attack
While having Bleeding I, player will get Bleeding II with increased duration after getting damage from arrow
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.meleeB: Length of bleeding from melee attacks
text.autoconfig.imbleeding.option.health: Length of health loss from spider attacks
